data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The 17th century introduced the minstrel Alan-a-Dale. He ____ appeared ____ a 17th-century broadside ____, ____ unlike ____ of ____ characters ____ associated, managed ____ adhere ____ the ____. The prose life of Robin Hood in Sloane Manuscript contains the substance of the Alan-a-Dale ballad but tells the story about Will Scarlet.
data.partBlankContent: The 17th century introduced the minstrel Alan-a-Dale. He fi___ appeared i_ a 17th-century broadside bal___, a__ unlike ma__ of t__ characters th__ associated, managed t_ adhere t_ the leg___. The prose life of Robin Hood in Sloane Manuscript contains the substance of the Alan-a-Dale ballad but tells the story about Will Scarlet.
data.answer: 17世纪出现了吟游诗人艾伦·戴尔。他第一次出现在17世纪的一首民谣中，与许多相关人物不同的是，他成功地延续了这一传统。《斯隆手稿》中罗宾汉的散文生活包含了艾伦-戴尔民谣的内容，却讲述了威尔-斯佳丽的故事。
